comment.body: @Pexo: How can i access to the hub?, i'm already registered, but i can't see the hub, only the first hub.

@Pexo: I read everything before i message you, but i didn't understand well, for me is too technical, so the thing is, where is the content ?, where i need to go ?. Sorry for asking this, maybe a lot of people ask the same thing over and over. But I'm very confused.

@Pexo: I should read everything again in order to tell you what i get and what i don't understand, and is a lot of text. But i asked you where is the content?, where i need to go ?. Can you tell me please?, sorry but it's been 3 days and i don't know what i need to do in order to access to the content. if you help me with that i will help you too, and obviously i'm going to read everything again ^^. But if you don't want just tell me please.
